title: DocSpace
description: ONLYOFFICE DocSpace is a collaborative cloud platform that allows users to store, manage, edit, and collaborate on documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and forms in customizable rooms.

title: Docs
description: Docs ONLYOFFICE Docs is a collaborative office suite that includes editors for text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, fillable forms, and PDFs. Search in all sections

title: Community Server
description: ONLYOFFICE Workspace is a collaborative cloud platform that allows users to manage documents, projects, emails, client relations, and timetables in one place.

title: JavaScript SDK
description: In this section, you will learn how to connect DocSpace as a frame to your website using api.js. You can embed an entire DocSpace portal, a single room, or a document.

title: Plugins SDK
description: In this section, you will learn how to create your own plugins and add them to the DocSpace portal.

title: API Backend
description: In this section, you will learn how to integrate ONLYOFFICE DocSpace into your own application and interact with its backend using the DocSpace API Backend  which is implemented as REST over HTTP using GET/POST/PUT/DELETE.

title: For hosting providers
description: In this section, you will learn how to provide the DocSpace portal as a SaaS solution on your own servers using our API methods.

title: Document Server
description: Bring document editing and co-authoring to your web app users. In this section, you will learn how to set up, configure and integrate ONLYOFFICE Docs.

title: Plugins and Macros
description: Extend the ONLYOFFICE Docs functionality. In this section, you will learn how to create your own plugins/macros: its structure, development lifecycle, and examples.

title: Document Builder
description: Generate documents easily without running a document editor. In this section, you will learn how to build documents using JavaScript and integrate Document Builder into your DMS, CRM system, etc.

title: Desktop Editors
description: Extend the ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors functionality. In this section, you will learn how to set up, customize and integrate them with the document management systems.

title: API Backend
description: In this section, you will learn how to integrate ONLYOFFICE Workspace into your own application and interact with its backend using the Workspace API Backend  which is implemented as REST over HTTP using GET/POST/PUT/DELETE. This solution is provided without editors, you need to install ONLYOFFICE Docs separately.

title: For hosting providers
description: In this section, you will learn how to provide the Workspace portal as a SaaS solution on your own servers using our API methods.
